My name is Junrui Di. I received my PhD degree in 2019 from the [Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health](http://www.jhsph.edu/) [Department of Biostatistics](http://www.jhsph.edu/departments/biostatistics/) (advisor: [Dr. Vadim Zipunnikov](http://www.biostat.jhsph.edu/~vzipunni/)). Before joining Hopkins, I received my Bachelor degree in Applied Mathematics from [UC Berkeley](https://math.berkeley.edu/) in 2012, and my Master degree in Biostatistics from [Georgetown University](https://biostatistics.georgetown.edu/) in 2013.
